Package Framework

Class Npc.Builder

java.lang.Object
Framework.Npc.Builder
Enclosing class:
Npc
public static class Npc.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
Inner class to create an Npc object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Builder​(java.lang.String name)
    Builder is used instead of a regular constructor

    Example usage:
    Npc npc = new Npc.Builder(String name).build();

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Npc.Builder addAbility​(Ability ability)

    • addAttribute

      public Npc.Builder addAttribute​(java.lang.String name, int value)
      Adds an attribute variable to an Npc
      Parameters:
      name - Sets the attribute name
      value - sets the attribute value

      Example usage:
      Npc npc = new Npc.Builder(String name).addAttribute(String name, int value).build();

      Parameters:
      width - Sets the width variable
      height - Sets the height variable

      Example usage:
      Npc npc = new Npc.Builder(String name).addlevel(int level).build();

    • build

      public Npc build()
      Creates an Npc object
      Returns:
      Returns an Npc object with the given values.
